          <title>
            <string language="fr">La Température Croissante</string>
            <string language="en">Increasing Temperature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zunehmende Temperatur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Temperatura Crescente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Temperatura Aumentante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυξανόμενη θερμοκρασία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Temperatura De Aumento</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Photosynthèse : La température croissante.  Exercice interactif, avec des réponses, regardant l'effet de la température sur la photosynthèse.</string>
            <string language="en">Photosynthesis: Increasing temperature. Interactive exercise, with answers, looking at the effect of temperature on photosynthesis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">photosynthèse</string>
            <string language="en">photosynthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'oxygène</string>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la température</string>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">usines</string>
            <string language="en">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotosynthese: Zunehmende Temperatur. 
Interaktive Übung, wenn die Antworten, betrachten, den Effekt 
der Temperatur auf Fotosynthese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fotossíntese: Temperatura crescente. 
Exercício interativo, com as respostas, olhando o efeito da 
temperatura na fotossíntese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fotosintesi: Temperatura aumentante. 
Esercitazione interattiva, con le risposte, guardanti l'effetto 
della temperatura su fotosintesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτοσύνθεση: Αυξανόμενη θερμοκρασία. 
Διαλογική άσκηση, με τις απαντήσεις, που εξετάζουν την 
επίδραση της θερμοκρασίας στη φωτοσύνθεση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fotosíntesis: Temperatura de aumento. 
Ejercicio interactivo, con las respuestas, mirando el efecto de 
la temperatura en fotosíntesis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotosynthese</string>
          </keyword>
